We Made Starter Packs For Your Favorite Artists

posted by Pigeons on November 18, 2014 in News
« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of
OT Genasis

The internet, amirite?!

If you spend all day on Twitter, hoping famous rappers will reply to your tweets like we do, you will have seen the “starter pack” meme.* Like most memes, it’s both dumb and occasionally hilarious, but even better, it’s very much applicable to some of our favorite artists. Behold, above, starter packs for Drake, Riff Raff, OT Genasis, Rick Ross, and more.

#becausetheinternet

* We still don’t really understand the meme. Also, where did it come from?!

Tags:  Diplo, drake, funny, Yung Lean
